name: Guess The Game Only By Listening (PowerPoint)
name_original: Guess The Game Only By Listening (PowerPoint)
description:
"Guess the game just by listening" It is a game created entirely in Microsoft PowerPoint.

Visual Basic for Applications (Macros) was also introduced for its development. So, in order to play, you must unlock the file.

- Category: "Quiz"

It simply consists of guessing the game, only listening to a characteristic sound of it. I hope you like it ^^

- Game content:  You will start with 3 lives and infinite time. When making a COMBO of 5, you will receive a heart. If you make a mistake or omit you will lose a heart. Only when you make a mistake, you will be able to occupy the track.  The sounds appear randomly and some are repeated.  I will add more sounds soon. ^^

*If you have any suggestion, also feel free to tell me ^^

* The game is saved, when you exit from the menu (So, I recommend you not to change the file name, and not to exit the game with the Esc key.)

If you find any bugs, or have problems downloading it, feel free to tell me in the comments. Thanks ^^

Contact me on Instagram and visit my Youtube channel.
